required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: AN EXPLORATORY FOLLOW-UP STUDY OF LONG TERM ANTI-TELOMERASE IMMUNE RESPONSE AFTER INVAC-1 VACCINATION IN PATIENTS WITH LONG TERM SURVIVAL. Addendum to INVAC1-CT-101 PROTOCOL - EUDRACT NUMBER : 2013-004369-15

brief_summary.textblock: This study will be an exploratory study of long term immunogenicity of INVAC-1 in patients who participated in the INVAC1-CT-101 phase I study (between 2014 and 2018).

detailed_description.textblock: The primary goal of the study is to analyze anti-telomerase specific memory responses in blood of long term survival patients and to correlate these immune responses to their subsequent treatment since the end of INVAC1-CT-101 phase I study. Six patients are expected to participate in this study.

primary_outcome.measure: long term anti telomerase specific memory responses
primary_outcome.description: will be measured by ELISPOT on blood of patients who were treated by INVAC-1 in the phase I NCT02301754 study and are still alive at the present time

arm_group.description: All patients have been treated by INVAC-1 vaccine during the previous phase 1 NCT02301754. No new treatment injection is required in this study.

intervention.intervention_name: INVAC-1 given in the previous phase 1 NCT02301754. No new injection is required in this study.
intervention.description: blood sampling will be drawn once in order to analyse long term memory immune response to INVAC-1 vaccine

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patients who participated in the phase I study and are still alive at the present time
2. Ability to provide written informed consent and to understand and comply with the requirements of the study.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Anemia (Hgb < 7g/dL) according to L-1121-1 annexe 2 of Code de Sant√© Publique
2. Systolic blood pressure below 90 mm Hg
